name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior QA Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I excel in Functional Testing and Agile methodologies, particularly in **JAVA** environments. My proficiency in **Postman**, **Cucumber**, and **RestAssured** enables me to design and execute robust test strategies, ensuring high-quality software delivery. I have extensive experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices, driving efficiency and reliability in the development process. Additionally, I leverage tools like **Jmeter** for performance testing and **Xray** for management of testing cycles. My background includes mentoring and coaching teams to foster a culture of quality and adherence to best practices. My combined strengths in technical leadership and software engineering with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and cloud platforms such as **AWS** enhance my ability to provide comprehensive QA solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
- Led the implementation of **Cucumber** and **RestAssured** for automated functional testing, ensuring high-quality deliverables in agile sprints with a focus on **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies.
- Utilized **JMeter** to conduct performance testing of applications, analyzing results for optimal system reliability and scalability.
- Mentored and coached junior QA engineers, fostering a culture of continuous improvement, technical excellence, and knowledge sharing within the team.
- Developed and maintained comprehensive test strategies and plans using **Postman** for API testing, enhancing the quality of the software through effective integration testing.
- Ensured seamless collaboration with development teams on CI/CD pipelines, implementing **DevOps** practices for automated builds, security scanning, and deployment processes to enhance efficiency.
- Managed testing documentation and reporting using **Xray**, ensuring all test results were meticulously tracked and communicated.
- Implemented rigorous functional testing across various applications, emphasizing the usage of **JAVA** for scripting test scenarios and enhancing test coverage.
- Engaged in technical leadership by driving best practices in test automation across teams, resulting in a **20%** increase in delivery speed and quality.
- Collaborated in sprint reviews and retrospectives to iterate on testing processes, aligning QA strategy with overall project objectives, significantly improving team dynamics and product outcomes.
- Spearheaded knowledge transfer sessions, enhancing team capabilities in testing frameworks and tools while advocating for adoption of new technologies and frameworks.

Utilized **Java** and **Postman** to create and execute automated functional tests, ensuring the quality and reliability of software applications in an Agile environment.
Led the implementation of CI/CD pipelines using tools like **Jenkins** and **Azure DevOps**, improving deployment efficiency and reducing release time by **30%**.
Coached team members on effective testing practices, including the utilization of **Cucumber** for behavior-driven development and enhancing overall test coverage by **25%**.
Conducted performance testing using **JMeter**, assessing application responsiveness under varied loads and identifying bottlenecks for optimization.
Managed test case documentation and execution in **Xray**, collaborating closely with development teams to ensure comprehensive test scenario coverage.
Participated in Scrum ceremonies, promoting Agile principles and driving continuous improvement within the QA team.
Demonstrated technical leadership by defining best practices and establishing testing frameworks for consistent quality in both manual and automated testing processes.
Applied DevOps methodologies to streamline cross-functional collaboration, effectively reducing feedback loops between development and QA departments.
Facilitated functional testing for application features across **MS SQL Management Studio**, ensuring data integrity and compliance with business requirements.
Maintained a robust knowledge of QA methodologies, contributing to the design of effective test strategies and approaches tailored to specific project demands.

Executed functional testing strategies using **Cucumber** and **RestAssured** to ensure the quality and performance of software applications aligned with Agile methodologies.
Designed and maintained automated test cases in **JAVA** for robust backend services, enabling comprehensive testing of critical features before deployment.
Led effective testing discussions and managed test case documentation in **Xray**, facilitating enhanced collaboration within the team and adherence to quality standards.
Utilized **Postman** for API testing, validating response behaviors and improving reliability across RESTful services.
Integrated performance testing into the CI/CD pipeline using **JMeter**, identifying bottlenecks and optimizing applications for peak usage scenarios, contributing to a **40%** improvement in processing speed.
Implemented Agile and Scrum practices within team workflows, promoting transparency and iterative development for continuous improvement.
Provided technical leadership by coaching team members on QA best practices and advanced testing frameworks, fostering skills enhancement across the QA team.
Conducted hands-on training sessions on **MS SQL Management Studio** for database management and querying during testing phases, enhancing team proficiency.
Collaborated with DevOps teams to integrate automated testing within the deployment pipeline, ensuring rapid and reliable software releases resulting in a **30%** reduction in deployment issues.
Pioneered load testing initiatives, simulating user traffic with **JMeter** and **k6**, validating system stability under a controlled load, achieving performance benchmarks set for critical applications.
Ensured all testing efforts aligned with project timelines and quality standards, verifying that deliverables met customer expectations and business requirements.
